item.title: Permanent Mesh Node
item.description: Placeholder to talk to [[Internet Archive Canada]] about hosting a mesh node at [[The Permanent]] as part of [[Stolon Mesh]].

item.title: Quartz
item.description: A Hugo-powered digital garden framework created by [[Jacky Zhao]] https://quartz.jzhao.xyz/ Extremely fast natural-language search Customizable and hackable design based on Hugo Automatically generated [[backlinks]], link previews, and local graph Built-in CJK + Latex Support and Admonition-style callouts Support for both Markdown Links and [[wikilinks]] It is [[Obsidian]] compatible, or can be edited directly through Github with basic Markdown skills.

item.title: Stolon Mesh
item.description: The Stolon Mesh is a project being run by [[221A]] to bring a wireless [[Mesh Network]] to Chinatown and the DTES.

item.title: Stolon Mesh Node at coFood Garden
item.description: The [[Stolon Mesh]] has an initial node in Chinatown in the garden on Union Street off Gore. We’re looking at setting up a community node in the [[coFood Collaborative Garden]].
